line.text: %PLAYER%: Professor Xavier, what are these creatures? They can't be indigenous to this island.
line.textb: %PLAYER%: Hey, Xavier, what are these creatures? I've never seen anything like them on Genosha.

line.text: %ProfX%: According to Sabretooth they're called Cerci. They were genetically designed for the attack on Genosha. They breed extremely fast in hopes that they'll overrun the island in a matter of weeks. Watch yourselves. Apparently they're quite deadly.
line.textb: %ProfX%: They're known as Cerci. Apocalypse had them genetically designed to aid in the attack on Genosha. They could potentially overrun the island in a matter of weeks.
